[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/grid-pro](./grid-pro.md) &gt; [GridProStatusBarConfig](./grid-pro.gridprostatusbarconfig.md)

## GridProStatusBarConfig interface

Configuration options for the grid status bar components

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface GridProStatusBarConfig 
```

## Remarks

This requires AG Grid Enterprise module to be enabled. Status bar components will only be displayed if the Enterprise module is available.
